hero.title: Welcome to Om Muktinath Dental Home
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner for reliable services

about.title: About Us
about.description: Learn more about our dental clinic and our journey to provide the best dental care
about.intro: At Om Muktinath Dental Home, we combine modern technology with compassionate care to give you the best dental experience possible. Our team of experienced dentists and staff are dedicated to providing high-quality dental services in a comfortable and welcoming environment.
about.services: We offer a comprehensive range of dental services including general dentistry, cosmetic procedures, orthodontics, pediatric care, and emergency treatments. Our clinic is equipped with state-of-the-art technology to ensure precise diagnoses and effective treatments.
about.mission: Our mission is to help our patients achieve and maintain optimal oral health through preventive care, education, and personalized treatment plans. We believe in transparent communication and making dental care accessible to everyone.
about.visionText: To be the leading dental care provider in the region, recognized for excellence in patient care, innovative treatments, and community service. We strive to create beautiful, healthy smiles that last a lifetime.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We offer a wide range of dental services to meet your needs, from routine check-ups to advanced cosmetic procedures.
services.generalDesc: Comprehensive exams, cleanings, and preventive care.
services.cosmeticDesc: Teeth whitening, veneers, and smile makeovers.
services.orthodonticsDesc: Braces and clear aligners for a straighter smile.
services.oralSurgeryDesc: Extractions, implants, and other surgical procedures.
services.pediatricDesc: Specialized care for children's dental health.
services.contactText: Contact us today to schedule an appointment and learn more about how we can help you achieve a healthy, beautiful smile!
services.priceListTitle: Om Muktinath Dental Home - Price List
services.priceListDesc: Our transparent pricing for all dental procedures

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.testimonial1: My experience at Om Muktinath Dental Home was excellent. The staff were friendly and helpful.
testimonials.testimonial2: I had my teeth cleaned here and the service was great. Dr. Anil is experienced and kind.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions or need to book an appointment? We're here to help!
contact.name: Name
contact.locationAddress: Opposite to bus ticket counter 1st floor
contact.shareLocationText: Check out Om Muktinath location on Google Maps
contact.doctorQuote: A genuine smile comes from the heart, but a healthy smile comes from good dental care

gallery.title: Our Clinic Gallery
gallery.description: Explore our dental clinic facilities and successful treatments through our photo gallery.
